Text:
Minimum system requirements

Video: NVidia GeForce 8600, Ati x1600 with SM3.0 and 256Mb VRAM 
RAM: 2Gb
CPU: 1800 MHz
OS: Windows XP, 2003, Vista, 7 (32/64bit)
System: Latest DirectX 9.0c, .NET Framework 3.5 or 4 (4.5 recommended)
Internet bandwidth: ~1 mbps.
